name: JMapper
short_description:
JMapper allows you to perform dynamic mappings with annotations and / or XML, bringing several advantages as:

considerable reduction of the amount of code
considerable reduction of development time
increase the robustness of the application
increase of the performance
create and enrich target objects
apply a specific logic to the mapping (only valued fields, only null fields, etc..)
automated management of the XML file
possibility of implementing the 1 to N and N to 1 relationships

With JMapper we have all the advantages of dynamic mapping with the performance of static code
summary: simpler, better and faster Java bean mapping
